content.webTitle: Travel news: A handy engagement for Romeos

fields.headline: A handy engagement for Romeos
fields.bodyText: Weak-kneed Romeos who fail to pluck up the courage to propose to their loved ones tomorrow will be glad to know that help is at hand in the unlikely shape of international hotel chain Fairmont Hotels & Resorts, which has created a new selection of packages designed to help would-be grooms (or brides) pop the question. Engaging Proposals packages include a night in a room filled with flowers, champagne and chocolates at the Savoy, from where lovers could whisk their intended to the London Eye for an unforgettable proposal in a pod. The hotel chain has 'engagement experts' on hand to set the scene, be it a rose petal-covered room, dinner for two on the beach, a special 'Carat Cake' or a public proposal at a Boston Red Sox game.
